caption:
This photograph depicts a large, powerful waterfall with substantial amounts of water cascading over a rocky ledge. The waterfall forms a wide, white curtain of water that crashes into a river below, creating a misty spray. The river in front of the waterfall has a rough, choppy surface indicating strong currents.

At the top left of the image, on a bank adjacent to the waterfall, there is a crowd of people. They are gathered behind metal railings, observing and perhaps photographing the scene. Some individuals are visible standing closer to the waterfall edge on a rocky outcrop, offering them a closer view. Alongside the river, there is a small, single-story building, possibly serving as a visitor center or a facility related to the site.

The background features a green landscape with trees and a distant bridge spanning the river. This adds a natural frame to the waterfall and the gathering area. The entire scene conveys a lively atmosphere of outdoor engagement where people come to admire the natural beauty of the waterfall.
title: American Niagara Falls and Prospect Park seen from Goat Island at the brink of the cataract
